meanings.definition: A type of wall construction using plasterboard or gypsum board.
meanings.sent1: The drywalls in the house were painted a bright white color.
meanings.sent2: The construction workers installed drywalls in the new building.
meanings.sent3: The drywalls in the room looked like a blank canvas waiting to be decorated.
meanings.sent4: The drywalls separated the rooms like silent guardians.
meanings.sent5: The smooth drywalls gleamed under the bright lights of the room.

meanings.definition: To construct walls using plasterboard or gypsum board.
meanings.sent1: They decided to drywalls the entire basement for a modern look.
meanings.sent2: The workers drywallsed the office space quickly and efficiently.
meanings.sent3: He drywallsed the room in record time, impressing everyone with his speed.
meanings.sent4: She carefully drywallsed the new house, ensuring every corner was perfect.
meanings.sent5: The team drywallsed the building with precision and skill.
